statements: SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, request_type FROM SLA_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority > 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline < NOW();
SELECT customer_id, request_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_type = 'Query';
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority = 1 AND current_status = 'waiting';
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 5 AND request_type = 'Ticket';
SELECT customer_id, request_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority < 3;
SELECT customer_id, request_type, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline > '2022-09-30 12:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, request_type FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority >= 3;
SELECT customer_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority = 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_type = 'Bug';
SELECT customer_id, request_type, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority > 4;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'in progress';
SELECT customer_id, request_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority <= 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline BETWEEN '2022-09-15 00:00:00' AND '2022-10-15 23:59:59';
SELECT customer_id, request_id, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority != 1;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT request_id, request_type, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority > 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'ongoing' AND escalation_priority >= 3;
SELECT customer_id, request_type, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority < 2;
SELECT DISTINCT request_type FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline > NOW();
SELECT customer_id, request_id, request_type, current_status, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, request_type FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status IN ('pending', 'started', 'paused');
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY sla_deadline DESC;
SELECT customer_id, request_id, request_type FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority = 5 AND current_status = 'ongoing' ORDER BY sla_deadline;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_type LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT customer_id, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_type = 'bug' AND current_status != 'resolved';
SELECT customer_id, request_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority = 2 OR current_status = 'resolved';
SELECT customer_id, request_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status NOT IN ('resolved', 'closed');
SELECT request_id, request_type, current_status FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority <= 4 AND sla_deadline >= NOW();
SELECT customer_id, request_id, request_type, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'paused' ORDER BY escalation_priority;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT AVG(escalation_priority) AS avg_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_deadline > NOW();
SELECT customer_id, request_id, request_type, current_status, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_type != 'feature' OR current_status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_id, request_id, request_type, current_status, escalation_priority FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, request_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_id IS NOT NULL AND escalation_priority < 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_id = 1;

SELECT escalation_id, priority_level, support_team FROM Escalation_prioritization WHERE priority_level > 2;

SELECT escalation_id, escalation_reason FROM Escalation_prioritization WHERE support_team = 'IT';
SELECT e.*, s.agreement_name FROM Escalation_prioritization e JOIN SLA_monitoring s ON e.sla_id = s.sla_id;
SELECT s.sla_id, e.priority_level FROM SLA_monitoring s LEFT JOIN Escalation_prioritization e ON s.sla_id = e.sla_id;
SELECT MAX(priority_level) FROM Escalation_prioritization;
SELECT MIN(priority_level) FROM Escalation_prioritization;
SELECT AVG(priority_level) FROM Escalation_prioritization;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Escalation_prioritization;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM SLA_monitoring GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT support_team, COUNT(*) FROM Escalation_prioritization GROUP BY support_team;
SELECT priority_level, AVG(priority_level) AS avg_priority FROM Escalation_prioritization GROUP BY priority_level;
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE agreement_name LIKE 'Service%');
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Escalation_prioritization);
SELECT * FROM SLA_monitoring UNION SELECT * FROM Escalation_prioritization;

SELECT AVG(escalation_level) FROM SLAs;

SELECT SupportRequests.id, SupportRequests.request_type, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SupportRequests JOIN SupportTeams ON SupportRequests.id = SupportTeams.id;

SELECT SLAs.name, COUNT(SupportRequests.id) AS total_requests FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id GROUP BY SLAs.name;

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.request_type, Escalations.description, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id;

SELECT SLAs.name, Escalations.escalation_level, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SupportRequests.request_type, Escalations.description, SupportRequests.requester_name, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SupportRequests JOIN Escalations ON SupportRequests.id = Escalations.id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.status, Escalations.escalation_level, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id LEFT JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id;

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.request_date, SupportRequests.status, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs LEFT JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id JOIN SupportTeams ON SupportRequests.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SupportRequests.request_type, SupportRequests.request_date, Escalations.description, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SupportRequests JOIN Escalations ON SupportRequests.id = Escalations.id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.request_date, SupportRequests.status, Escalations.escalation_level, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs LEFT JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.status, Escalations.escalation_level, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id LEFT JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SupportRequests.request_type, SupportRequests.request_date, Escalations.description, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SupportRequests JOIN Escalations ON SupportRequests.id = Escalations.id LEFT JOIN SupportTeams ON Escalations.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT SLAs.name, SupportRequests.request_date, SupportRequests.status, SupportTeams.team_name FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.id LEFT JOIN SupportTeams ON SupportRequests.id = SupportTeams.id WHERE SupportRequests.status = 'Open';

SELECT id, sla_id, urgency_level FROM Escalations;
SELECT id, request_text, request_timestamp, status FROM SupportRequests;
SELECT Users.id, username, email, role FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id;
SELECT SLAs.id, name, description, target_response_time FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.sla_id;
SELECT Escalations.id, sla_id, urgency_level, escalation_contact, name, target_response_time FROM Escalations JOIN SLAs ON Escalations.sla_id = SLAs.id;
SELECT Users.id, username, email, role, role_id FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id;
SELECT id, username, email, role, role_id FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id;
SELECT SLAs.id, name, description, target_response_time, sla_id, request_text, request_timestamp, status FROM SLAs JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.sla_id;
SELECT SLAs.id, name, description, target_response_time, sla_id, escalation_contact, urgency_level FROM SLAs JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id;

SELECT * FROM Escalations WHERE urgency_level > 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM SLAs WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT sla_id FROM Escalations);
SELECT id, request_text FROM SupportRequests WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT Users.username, UserRoles.role_id FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id;
SELECT SLAs.name, Escalations.escalation_contact FROM SLAs INNER JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id;
SELECT Users.username, SupportRequests.request_text FROM Users INNER JOIN SupportRequests ON Users.id = SupportRequests.sla_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLAs;
SELECT AVG(target_response_time) FROM SLAs GROUP BY name;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) FROM Users GROUP BY role;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id GROUP BY role_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT SLAs.name, COUNT(*) FROM SLAs INNER JOIN SupportRequests ON SLAs.id = SupportRequests.sla_id GROUP BY SLAs.name;
SELECT Users.username, SUM(target_response_time) FROM Users INNER JOIN SLAs ON Users.id = SLAs.id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT Users.username, MAX(urgency_level) FROM Users INNER JOIN Escalations ON Users.id = Escalations.sla_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT Users.username, MIN(target_response_time) FROM Users INNER JOIN SLAs ON Users.id = SLAs.id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT SLAs.name, AVG(urgency_level) FROM SLAs INNER JOIN Escalations ON SLAs.id = Escalations.sla_id GROUP BY SLAs.name;
SELECT Users.username, MAX(escalation_contact) FROM Users INNER JOIN Escalations ON Users.id = Escalations.sla_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT Users.username, MIN(escalation_contact) FROM Users INNER JOIN Escalations ON Users.id = Escalations.sla_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT DISTINCT Users.username FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT Users.username, SupportRequests.request_timestamp FROM Users INNER JOIN SupportRequests ON Users.id = SupportRequests.sla_id ORDER BY request_timestamp DESC;
